externalId.description: An external ID that can be used to identify this object in an external system such as a warehousing system

availableForSale.description: The item is currently available for ordering at this location

minimumSelection.description: Minimum number of options that must be selected from this group. 0 means it is optional.

maximumSelection.description: Maximum number of options that can be selected from this group. 1 means it is a single select (radio-button).

maximumOfEachModifier.description: Quantity of each modifier you can at most select. For example if you were selecting a dozen donuts with at most 3 of each variety this would be set to 3 with maximum and minimum selections to 1and2. 0 means no limit up to group maximum.

modifiers.description: Pkeys of xyz.noshdelivery.v0.catalog.modifierGroup records that belong in this item. Ordered in the way they will be presented.
